name: Office - The Game
description:
Story: You are a normal person living a normal life, working a normal job in a completely normal office, when one day your boss calls you and makes you work overtime, as a night guard.

               At First, everything seems normal, but as each day progresses, you see things misplaced or the whole office being different. Explore the map and enjoy some old-fashoned horror gameplay!

Gameplay: Horror/Freeroam.

Around 30 minutes to beat the game

57% finished!
